001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collection;
006
007public interface IsInPredicateBuilder<T, TValue> extends ComparablePredicateBuilder<T, TValue> {
008
009    default CombinationQueryPredicate<T> isIn(final Iterable<TValue> value) {
010        Collection<QueryPredicate> p = new ArrayList<>();
011        value.forEach(v -> p.add(format(v)));
012        return combinationFn().apply(predicate().operator(PredicateOperator.IS_IN.toString())
013                .right(ContainerQueryPredicate.of().inner(CollectionQueryPredicate.of().predicates(p))));
014    }
015
016}
